definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Mrs Dalloways is one of the typical works on stream of consciousness by Virginia Woolf.
sentences.chinese: 《達羅衛夫人》是伍爾夫意識流小說的經典之作。

sentences.english: These latent impressions help consciousness flow from one tranquil moment to the next.
sentences.chinese: 這些智識將會幫助意識流延續其自身的平靜。

sentences.english: The stream in which the swimmer courses represents a stream of consciousness expressed in hand signs.
sentences.chinese: 圖中游泳者順沿而下的河流中手的符號表示了意識流。

sentences.english: Interest in your stream of consciousness takes you to awareness.
sentences.chinese: 對本身意識流的興趣會將你導向覺性。

sentences.english: Do you like fictions of stream of consciousness?
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡閱讀意識流小說嗎？

sentences.english: The revelation of "inward turning"is the appearance of psychological novel and stream-of-consciousness novel.
sentences.chinese: 內轉的具體表現是心理小說和意識流小說的產生。

sentences.english: An article about “the stream of consciousness” and that does not belong to Kundera.
sentences.chinese: 一篇有關意識流以及意識流不屬於米蘭昆德拉的文章。

sentences.english: An article about “the stream of consciousness” and that does not belong to Kundera.
sentences.chinese: 一篇有關意識流以及意識流不屬於米蘭昆德拉的文章。

definition: words do not convey the meaning/poorly expressed/senseless/inarticulate
tone sandhi/modified tone/(music) to change key/modulation
impression of a book/opinion expressed in a book review
lit. to play the lute to a cow (idiom)/fig. offering a treat to an unappreciative audience/to cast pearls before swine/caviar to the general/to preach to deaf ears/to talk over sb's head
lit. draw legs on a snake (idiom); fig. to ruin the effect by adding sth superfluous/to overdo it
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
